SEARCH
Package controller.file.enquiry

Class WriteEnquiry

Object
WriteEnquiry
public class WriteEnquiry extends Object
Utility class for reading and writing enquires to a CSV file Provides methods for writing, deleting, updating, and replying to enquiries in the CSV file
Since:
25/11/23
Version:
1.0
Author:
SCSZ Group 4

    • areEnquiriesEqual

      public static boolean areEnquiriesEqual(Enquiry enquiry, String[] columns)
      Checks if an Enquiry object is equal to the columns in a CSV row.
      Parameters:
      enquiry - - The Enquiry object to compare.
      columns - - The CSV row columns.
      Returns:
      true if the Enquiry object is equal to the CSV row, false otherwise.

    • areEnquiriesEqualVerbose

      public static boolean areEnquiriesEqualVerbose(Enquiry selectedEnquiry, String[] columns)
      Checks if an Enquiry object is equal to the columns in a CSV row in a verbose manner.
      Parameters:
      selectedEnquiry - - The Enquiry object to compare.
      columns - - The CSV row columns.
      Returns:
      true if the Enquiry object is equal to the CSV row, false otherwise.
